title: Drawing, "Study for Poster: Official for Winter Double Shell Lubricating Oil for Shell-Mex", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and black wash, gouache, graphite on thin wove paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A running figure composed of red dots and dashes, left.  In the center, a snowman with a battered top hat and umbrella. Figures set against a black ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for Poster: Official for Winter Double Shell Lubricating Oil for Shell-Mex", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and black wash, gouache, graphite on thin wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-543.
